This is a title

It is argued that Field Theory is relevant in psychology (Lewin, 1951). Uznadze (2009) might agree with that, as his theory is in part inspired by it.

Bibliography

Lewin, K. (1951). Field theory in social science: selected theoretical papers (edited by dorwin cartwright.).
